modName: PSSF - High Performance Beauty Post-Processing FX
summary: Best solution for superb visual with minimum FPS hit!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center]Have you ever feel betrayed when you tried those [color=#cc0000]"zero fps hit"[/color] post-processing effects, but still get much fps hit because your PC is not good enough? Or you have tried true minimum fps hit effects, but doesnt look as good? Now there's a solution for you whose computer is bad enough to run [color=#ffe599]ENBs[/color], but want to get at least, almost as good as[color=#f6b26b] [/color][color=#ffd966]ENBs[/color]![/center][/size]

[size=4][color=#ffff00]PetrukStark[/color][color=#00ffff]'s SweetFX preset! YOUR BEST SOLUTION FOR [/color][color=#ff0000]HIGH PERFORMANCE[/color][color=#00ffff] BEAUTY POST-PROCESSING FX![/color][/size]

[color=#00ff00]Featuring[/color]:
 - SweetFX by CeeJay (Thank you for creating such miracle :D)
 - Very, very low FPS hit (Depends on your rig, but even older PCs like mine could only get no more than 3-5 fps hit :D)
 - Nice color composition! (Especially when sunny sunrises or sunsets :D)
 - Gaussian bloom shader (Adds almost-true bloom to the game :D)
 - Sub-Morphological Anti-Aliasing/SMAA (Nice post-process anti-aliasing with minimum performance hit :D)
 - No ENB needed ;D

[color=#00ff00]How to install[/color]:
Extract everything inside (YES EVERYTHING INSIDE, because it has additional shader files and different d3d9.dll) to your Skyrim directory (where the tesv.exe is located) and happy gaming :D

[color=#00ff00]How to uninstall[/color]:
Delete what you have extracted.

[color=#00ff00]Footnote[/color]:
You can't turn off the SweetFX :(
If you want to make a comparison pic, activate the splitscreen setting by changing #define USE_SPLITSCREEN 0 to #define USE_SPLITSCREEN 1 in sweetfx_settings.txt
Also I didnt use any weather mod when taking screenshots, the experince may vary depends on weather mods usage.
author: PetrukStark
